description: Monitor M365 Audit logs for the Operations Add app role assignment grant to user and/or Consent to application occurring against AzureActiveDirectory Workloads. NOTE: Similar events are generated in Azure AD (Entra ID) audit logs. Analytic 1 - Stolen Access Token source="*Azure:m365" workload == “AzureActiveDirectory” AND (operation == “Add app role assignment grant to user” OR operation == “Consent to application”)
